text: “E inu amene mwakhulupirira! Musakhale ngati amene sadakhulupirire, nanena za anzawo pamene akuyenda pa dziko kapena pomwe akumenyana nkhondo (ndikufera konko): “Akadakhala ndi ife sakadafa, ndiponso sakadaphedwa.” Allah (adawathira maganizo amenewa) kuti azipange zimenezo kukhala zodandaulitsa m’mitima mwawo. Komatu Allah ndi amene amapereka moyo ndi imfa. Ndipo Allah akuona zonse zomwe mukuchita
